title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that plugs Ollama into LangChain LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive terminal UI (TUI) for chatting with Ollama models written in Rust.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: GitHub Actions collection to pull, benchmark, and deploy Ollama models in CI/CD.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: gRPC service wrapper around Ollama HTTP API for high-throughput micro-services.

title: ollama-benchmark
summary: Standardized benchmark suite (latency, throughput, memory) for all Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in Docker Compose.

title: ollama-node-red
summary: Node-RED nodes to call Ollama chat/embed in IoT & automation flows.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for chatting with Ollama models in mobile & desktop apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with async enumerables for streaming tokens.

title: ollama-model-zoo
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles (code, role-play, uncensored, etc.).

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel-wide LLM chats.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes with templater support.
